blogPost.excerpt: A free app that helps founders manage their investor courting process. If you know a founder raising capital or plan to do so yourself one day, this is a must. We are offering FounderZ created on our platform FREE to anyone starting a business this year.
blogPost.body: A free app that helps founders manage their investor courting process. If you know a founder raising capital or plan to do so yourself one day, this is a must. We are offering FounderZ created on our platform FREE to anyone starting a business this year.
blogPost.title: FounderZ - Free app for founders to manage the fund raising process
blogPost.author: Sridhar Machiroutu

localize.description: 一款帮助创始人管理投资人追求过程的免费应用。如果你认识一个创始人在筹集资金，或者计划有一天自己也要这样做，这是一个必须要做的事情。我们将向今年创业的人免费提供在我们平台上创建的FounderZ。
localize.tagline: 创始人管理筹资过程的免费应用。

localize.description: 一款幫助創始人管理投資人追求過程的免費應用。如果你認識一個創始人在籌集資金，或者計劃有一天自己也要這樣做，這是一個必須要做的事情。我們將向今年創業的人免費提供在我們平臺上創建的FounderZ。
localize.tagline: 創始人管理籌資過程的免費應用。

previous.excerpt: Few have access to advanced tools & products in the current financial system. dYdX empowers traders with powerful, scalable, transparent, and fair financial products. We built the fastest decentralized exchange, built on Ethereum and powered by StarkWare.
previous.title: dYdX - Start trading on #DeFi with low fees and up to 25× leverage
